name: 2rexbiia
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1))

stmt.origin: rexbiia(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1)))

stmt.origin: rexbidva(s1, c1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, w1)
stmt.pretty: rexbidva(s1, c1, s0 ∈ c0, w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(wrex(s1, c1, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
-| diffsc(s1, cv(s0))
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s1, cv(s0))
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s1, s0)

|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Inference adding two restricted existential quantifiers to both sides of an equivalence. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-2004.)
